ribbon.title: Books & Blogs
ribbon.description: Explore our curated books and thought-provoking research blogs covering computational multiphysics, machine learning, and scientific innovation.

items.title: Computational Multiphysics Foundations
items.short: A comprehensive guide to multiphysics modeling and simulation.A comprehensive guide to multiphysics modeling and simulation.
items.full: This book presents theoretical foundations and practical approaches for computational multiphysics including fluid-structure interaction, reactive flows, and numerical methods.

items.title: AI in Energetic Materials Research
items.short: How machine learning accelerates materials discovery.
items.full: We discuss deep learning-driven microstructure generation, surrogate modeling, and predictive simulation frameworks transforming energetic materials research.
